product_name: CliniqueTake The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover Mini
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover is a silky, lightweight makeup remover that quickly dissolves tenacious eye and face makeups, sunscreens.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin TypesClinique's #1 makeup remover in a silky balm formula.Solid makeup-removing balm transforms into a silky oil-based cleanser upon application.Cleans thoroughly, rinses off completely.Gently helps remove the stress of pollution so skin looks younger, longer.Built on Dermatological Science: As a dermatologist-guided brand, Clinique's commitment to safety starts with skincare science. Clinique partners with the best minds in dermatology and formulate for all skin types, tones, concerns - in service of all skin.Allergy tested.Paraben-free. Phthalate-free. Fragrance-free.Key IngredientsSafflower seed oil: Works efficiently to help break up natural oil found on skin, as well as dissolves hard-to-remove makeup. Rich in linoleic acid, this natural emollient helps leave skin feeling soft and nourished.Research ResultsOver 95% removal of face makeup, sunscreen, and pollutants.**Average removal of longwearing foundation, hybrid sunscreen, and carbon powder.Item 2532674How To UseUse this makeup remover balm before other cleansers and treatment products.Massage cleansing balm over dry skin with dry fingertips.Rinse well with warm water.Pat dryFollow with cleanser, then apply eye cream, serum, and moisturizer.Follow with Clinique Take the Day Off Makeup Remover for Lids, Lashes, & Lips.IngredientsEthylhexyl Palmitate, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic / Capric Triglyceride, Sorbeth-30 Tetraoleate, Polyethylene, PEG-5 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Water / Aqua / Eau, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use this makeup remover balm before other cleansers and treatment products.Massage cleansing balm over dry skin with dry fingertips.Rinse well with warm water.Pat dryFollow with cleanser, then apply eye cream, serum, and moisturizer.Follow with Clinique Take the Day Off Makeup Remover for Lids, Lashes, & Lips.
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Burns
reviews.comments: I was looking for a new makeup remover and this was not it. I just had a little mascara and it left a film in my eyes and burned all around my eyes. Now I have watery, red puffy eyes. It also didn't do a great job compared to my oil based remover

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: This stuff just melts your makeup off. Does not feel greasy when you are done, just feels clean. I love this!

reviews.headline: Cult classic for a reason
reviews.comments: This balm effortlessly melts makeup off no matter how much product you have on. Very effective and easy to use. Has not stripped my skin or given me any reactions either.

reviews.headline: Cleansing balm
reviews.comments: This works well in taking off makeup. Would repurchase.

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments: This did absolutely nothing for me. It didnt break down or take off my makeup or mascara as i wouldve expected. Still had to use my makeup remover wipes because this balm just made more of mess if anything. Honestly, this was a waste of money for me.

reviews.headline: This works!
reviews.comments: My face is clearer than ever because this actually removes all my make-up!

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: I bought this for traveling since it is a small size.  It worked well on a sunburned face without drying.

reviews.headline: Love this cleansing balm as much as the one I paid $200 more
reviews.comments: I actually look forward to my evening ritual now that I have Clinique's Cleansing Balm! I loved my other designer one, but just couldn't justify the cost.This balm is relaxing, does an amazing job, and feels so good on my sensitive skin, it is beautiful!

reviews.headline: I have bought this product over and over again
reviews.comments: It takes off all my makeup. Even waterproof mascara!  It does not leave a sticky or oily residue. I am hooked.

reviews.headline: Love this cleanser
reviews.comments: Love having this cleanser in a small size to take on vacation. Feels great on my skin. Takes off all makeup.

reviews.headline: I love this product
reviews.comments: This is the only makeup remover that doesn't bother my eyes.  It's not drying and it removes all my heavy makeup including waterproof mascara with ease.

reviews.headline: Great cleansing balm
reviews.comments: I have this cleansing balm for a while and I love it. I have tried other brands and irritates my eyes. I would definitely keep buying it

reviews.headline: This product is great.
reviews.comments: This product is wonderful. Definitely will buy again

reviews.headline: worth every penny.
reviews.comments: this balm is the best ðŸ‘Œ,  gentle on and around  the eyes, soft , Remove everything: spf, make up, sweat . Ive tried others nothing compares

reviews.headline: Ew
reviews.comments: Love a cleansing balm but number one this isn't super effective on mascara like other balms and it smells like rancid oil.  Such an unpleasant experience.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: This works so well. Takes off ALL the makeup easily and doesn't make my skin feel dry after.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments:
Love how easy it is to use
Put it on and get in shower and leaves my face very clean

reviews.headline: Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm
reviews.comments: I will never use anything else but Take The Day Off Cleansing  Balm. It leaves my skin hydrated and very clean. It is well worth the price. I have used many cleansers before that left my skin dry and itchy. Well done Clinique such a great product

reviews.headline: The best makeup remover
reviews.comments: This takes off my mascara with ease. And I don't need to use a lot

reviews.headline: STAY AWAY!!!!!
reviews.comments: I had perfect skin and 1 month ago I decided to try this product to help take off my makeup. I started to notice some small whiteheads at first and didn't think much of it. But now im battling full on cystic acne and big pimples all over my face aswell as the small whiteheads. The texture is weird too. This literally ruined my skin in one month!!! Nothing else had changed in my rutine except this. Stay away please.

media.headline: Instant bright red face!
media.caption: Bright red allergic took place instantly

media.headline: It's so amazing and easy to use definitely would buy again â¤

faceoff_positive.comments: I am currently being treated for leukemia, and chemo is really harsh on my skin. I get rashes and scabs and my skin dries and peels. My skin has also become super sensitive all over, so I've had to stop using my regular products and find something gentler. I remembered using Clinique when I was younger and how gentle it was, so I looked through their products and found this. The balm helps with moisture, which I then kick up a little bit with the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel. The best part is that when my scalp started to get dry (no hair the past couple months), I just applied this to my scalp and like I do to my face and I get a clean scalp that's ready for a moisturizer too. I know this is meant to take off make up and to follow up with the 3-step system, but this gets my skin so clean and fresh feeling that I use it as a face cleanser all on its own. There are lots of little things that come from treatment that are just a reminder that the cancer is there, like pain and sensitivity. I really like that I can depend on this to help me feel normal, at least when I wash my face.
faceoff_positive.headline: Gentle enough for chemo skin!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been using Clinique for over 30 years, and noticed a lot of changes (and not very positive ones at that). "Take the Day Off," in the old days was only sold as a liquid and did a great job! Now, I have both liquid and cream and neither removes non waterproof mascara or eyeliner. You'd have to rub your skin off to get it off and I really don't get all the positive reviews. Clinique needs to step up and either find the old ingredients used in their products that made them work or really go back to the drawing board!
faceoff_negative.headline: Refuses to remove eyeliner and mascara

rollup.name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover Mini
